contextId.information: After "spider" the phrase "builds his web" is understood. AT: "as a spider builds its web" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
contextId.quote: He builds his house like a spider

contextId.information: The missing word may be added. AT: "a child's flesh" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
You may need to add the omitted words. AT: "more than the first part of his life" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
